title: 1667: The Best Exercises You Can Do to Develop the Perfect Butt
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin cover the most effective butt building exercises.

  • Why is the butt a muscle that everyone focuses on? (2:54)
  • The challenges people face in building their butt. (6:44)
  • The reasons why your butt is NOT responding. (9:23)
  • The importance of frequency and emphasizing the RIGHT exercises. (16:40)
  • The Best Exercises You Can Do to Develop the Perfect Butt. 
  • #1 – Barbell Hip Thrust. (24:46)
  • #2 – Barbell Back Squat. (27:33)
  • #3 – Deadlift Variations. (30:28)
  • #4 – Good Mornings. (36:33)
  • #5 – Spilt Stance Variations. (37:52)
  • #6 – Single Leg Variations. (41:23)
